name: nonicons
description: A set of icons representing programming languages, designing & development tools.

scripts.fonts: icon-font-generator dist/icons/*.svg -o dist -n nonicon -p nonicon --height 1000 --center --descent 200 --codepoints src/template/mapping.json --json false --types 'ttf'
scripts.dev: yarn clean && yarn move8 && yarn move9 && yarn svgo && yarn fonts

author: yamatsum
